name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
title: Xiao: Conqueror of Evil
desc: Evil shall be dispersed, and the vile will be scattered.
in_play_description: While your Xiao has Yaksha's Mask attached, your use of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling will cost 1 less Anemo Die. (Every attachment of Yaksha's Mask allows the effect to be triggered twice)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Xiao to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Xiao, equip this card.
After Xiao equips this card, immediately use Bane of All Evil once.
While your Xiao has Yaksha's Mask attached, your use of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling will cost 1 less Anemo Die. (Every attachment of Yaksha's Mask allows the effect to be triggered twice)
(You must have Xiao in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
